name: Umbra (CrystalLA)
description:
Welcome to Umbra! 

This game was made for the Secret Santa Jam!

Explore 4 different lands as 4 different animals, each with their own unique abilities!

Explore a luscious green forest as the rabbit, a beautiful blue meadow as the deer, a rocky and red hill as the fox and the snowy mountain peaks as the owl! Collect soul flames to restore peace and balance to the land!
